website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic XG2401 is a moderately priced 24-inch gaming monitor that delivers great performance and some nice features for gamers. Its viewing angles and color accuracy could be better, though.
pros: Speedy pixel response and refresh rate
Great gaming performance in our tests

customer_reviews.title: G sync compatible
customer_reviews.text: I can confirm that the monitor is G sync compatible. I have it for about 2 weeks now and all you have to do is enable the monitor freesync then enable it in Nvidia graphics and it works great. Gaming quality and performance is unbelievable. However the usual desktop quality is average but not bad.
customer_reviews.author: A. Elkhouli

customer_reviews.title: Freesync now with Nvidia
customer_reviews.text: Get the latest drivers from 1/15/19. Open the display settings on the LCD itself, to activate freesync. Your GTX Nvidia card can now enable Freesync in the settings. ;) Yes, it's a kick'n awesome screen.
customer_reviews.author: James Burke

customer_reviews.title: Check what cables/connections are necessary
customer_reviews.text: I am returning the monitor. I bought it to use as an add on display to my laptop. The FreeSync feature requires using the display port. My laptop has display port capability via a USB-C port, not a standard display port. The box had a display port cable in it, but with 2 standard display port connectors. I would have had to buy another cable, USB-C to display port, for about $50 to make it work properly. That made the whole purchase too expensive. I did not use the monitor long enough to comment on quality or other features. I am buying a different monitor with FreeSync via HDMI, which my laptop has.
customer_reviews.author: Ltripreno

customer_reviews.title: A really good 144hz 1080p Gaming monitor
customer_reviews.text: After looking at numerous products in my budget pc gaming rig. I stumbled across the ViewSonic 144hz 1080p gaming monitor. I really like the durability and picture quality of this product. If you are looking for a good monitor that plays 144hz at 1080p for under $150 then this should be a viable option for you. I bought this gaming monitor to go with my RX580 Ryzen 5 build. Product was very easy to put together and I like the option to hook your head phones on the back of the monitor as well. Overall great quality and product, wont disappoint. Picture quality is clear, no missing pixels are anything that interferes with the picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Tank-like monitor with above expected quality!!
customer_reviews.text: excellent quality, sturdy as a tank, has options to change response time among other things, the ASUS of equal specs that I bought is cheap compared to these monitors, could not recommend more highly, like the other reviewer here says "never heard of viewsonic so I was skeptical" well, take it from him and me, it is an excellent monitor, have purchased two, the ASUS we recently got was cheaper, but.. it's also cheaper quality, would recommend this monitor any day of the week over the ASUS! also, this comes with all cords you could need vs asus only coming with a DVI...
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: YAS!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! My boyfriend built my pc and he's a bit jealous of how it came out lol. Time to upgrade his soon, maybe he will get the same kind. I love the feature where you can adjust the height! Only con I would have is the buttons on the bottom of the screen, I would love if it came with a little remote. Or just an easier way to navigate, I was always horrible doing that for my tv....long story short my boyfriend does it for me :p. Thank you for the great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Myracle

customer_reviews.title: seemed great but.... bad pixel
customer_reviews.text: I hope this was a fluke. I know since the last time i had bought a PC monitor it's BEEN YEARS!!!! But in all of my years in gaming 20+ I have NEVER had a pixel go out on me? And in less then a month I had one go!?!? So based on the reviews I hope this was an anomaly. I really like the monitor and all of it's features. It's nice works well for what I need and is very good quality for the price. Here is hoping I don't run into the same issue with the replacement...
customer_reviews.author: John - Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great refresh, amazing brightness and colors
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems setting this up. I will be getting another for dual monitors. It's that good. Especially for the price. I concur, the brightness was set to 100 (max) out of the box. I had to turn it down. The colors are fantastic. I use the DP port in my Geforce GTX 1070 ti and the refresh rate is 144hz. Confirmed.
customer_reviews.author: Superkid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for the price. Check for dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Warnings: Arrived with stuck pixels. Make sure to check yours if this is a purchase for someone else. Pros: Under 200$ for 1080p 1ms monitor. Rotating screen mount - This is actually pretty amazing especially for a dual monitor setup. Cons: Mediocre image clarity and colors. Bulky monitor. Commentary: To get the best of both worlds (Image and 1ms response) you will have to go above this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Real food matters

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a price that can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 24" 144hz. Monitor is light, customization is endless. Upgraded from 24", edge lit, 5ms and it's great. It takes time to set up color and all, but worth it. The stand is incredible. Almost as impressive as the monitor. Smooth motion, very sturdy, a bit heavy but in the best way. Display Port cable is only about 6ft. It barely reached from the floor to the monitor on a double stand. Ended up purchasing a 10ft cable, I would recommend other doing the same unless you have your source right next to the monitor. Can't knock any starts for an accessory though. Picked up for 208, blown away. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellence from every angle
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these monitors for a double screen setup in my office. Both are hooked up to my MacBook for extended desktop use. I also have a PlayStation 4 connected to one screen for gaming use. The amazing resolution and color displays make the experience over the top. I have my speaker set up connected to the aux output in the monitor. It’s makes my office a great environment. Especially works well on a corner desk. The L shape is the desk I have for multiple angle usage.
customer_reviews.author: Mikvikpik

It was a plug and play experience for me and I am very picky when it comes to colors and contrast. Cause you gonna have to look around to take it all in. 24 inch is big enough and you don't have to look around to see the entire image and 1080p is a natural resolution of 24 inch monitors.

This is my everyday monitor
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Young

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor I've ever owned. While it functions flawlessly for gaming, it's also great at everything else I use it for. Text and images are very crisp and clear, color accuracy and b/w ballance is very very good, and all functions are easy to navigate and use. Every different make and model of video card will output color and images at least a little differently, so make sure to do some fine tuning adjustments in the monitor settings to get things where you want them.
customer_reviews.author: Tellin' it like it is!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review until I was able to upgrade my GPU to an RX 580. Now that I've done that...wow. Amazing performance. Now that FreeSynch is being used, my gaming is way smoother. Looks great for gaming and for general use. This monitor was recommended to me by a friend that builds gaming PCs and I recommend it as well. If I get a second monitor, it'll be another just like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kitchens

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor. Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Worth the buy! Looks great plenty of inputs and the audio isn't bad either. Considering a second one for a dual monitor setup Edit: I am changing this review to 3 Stars because i turned my monitor on to game yesterday and was noticing a row of dead pixels. It was on every window i opened so i could eliminate the thought of a messed up program. Going to contact Customer Service and see if they can help me
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: 4.5 Year Owner Update
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this monitor for about 4.5 years now. Initially, it was great and reasonable (early freesync days were expensive). It had generally okay colors and brightness, but it wasn't anything to write home about. However, recently it has been having more and more brightness fluctuations. Instead of the regular color gamut you would expect, the screen is starting to get washed out heavily. I would not recommend this monitor. Viewsonic has a 3 year limited warranty, so purchase at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J. LR

customer_reviews.title: Unusable! Constantly disconnects - DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Unusable! This thing is so poor quality! The thing constantly disconnects and resets the input. I'm talking every 5 seconds sometimes. Tried different HDMI cables, using display port, laptop vs xbox vs docking station. IT DOESN'T MATTER. This thing will constantly screw up and restart the connection ALL OF THE TIME. It is completely unusable! Try to play a game, 20 seconds in about to get a kill, monitor connection restarts... good luck gaming with this.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Great TN Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great colors for a TN panel and 144hz saved my life. One thing to keep in mind is that IPS panels are coming out now that don't have ghosting issues and good response times. Also, TN panels have bad viewing angles but I don't know anyone who doesn't look straight on using a monitor so if that bothers you I'd get something like the aoc 24g2 panel.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well with XBOX ONE or PS4
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for competitive gaming on consoles and the picture is definitely an upgrade from my TV but not top tier on consoles. This could totally be due to console output but neither my PS4 or XBONE allow HDR to it so theres that. I am hoping it will do better on the next gen. That being said, The graphics for games like God of War, Hellblade, Warzone, and Last of us were great. I do get sheering when I use it as a second monitor with my apple laptop and chrome book though.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Poole

customer_reviews.title: Very delicate and apparently not well built -
customer_reviews.text: Fine monitor but after 4 months sitting on the desk in my home had this white block appear (see pic). Contacted ViewSonic and was informed monitor failure was a result of impact damage and NOT covered by warranty. Cannot imagine what could have impacted this monitor with a force that would cause total loss failure. This was the first and will be the last dainty ViewSonic devices I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: leland olsen

customer_reviews.title: Good for 1080p gaming

customer_reviews.title: and to be honest i love it, its the best monitor you can possible ...

I can't take advantage of the free sync because i have a 1070 GPU but with a "red team" card this should blow your mind. I read some good reviews on this monitor prior to buying, but now I wish I went with a different one. I have to say in game, the picture quality is very good and I am happy about that.

My biggest gripe with it is that the OSD is a bit confusing (the buttons are swapped compared to what you'd expect) and some of the settings aren't well explained. Other than that, it's an amazing monitor.

product_meta.title: ViewSonic XG2401 24 Inch 1080p 1ms 144 Hz Gaming Monitor with FreeSync Premium Eye Care Advanced Ergonomics HDMI and DP,Black
product_meta.description: The ViewSonic XG2401 is a 24” Full HD monitor packed with all the speed and features that diehard gaming enthusiasts need. Featuring an incredible 144Hz refresh rate, as well as VESA Adaptive-Sync Technology, this monitor’s variable refresh rate capabilities virtually eliminate screen tearing and stuttering for fluid gameplay during fast-paced action scenes. A blazing-fast 1ms response time and low input lag provides smooth screen performance even in the most graphic-intense sequences. For optimum speed and performance, SmartSync technology automatically selects the best refresh rate and response time, and lowest input lag needed in FPS games. For a game-winning competitive edge, a Game Mode feature optimizes visuals for FPS, RTS and MOBA. On top of that, a black stabilization function helps you target enemies lurking in the dark, while the monitor maintains brilliantly rich colors and contrast. With a gamer-inspired ergonomic stand that features an integrated headphone hook and cable management functionality, the XG2401 has all you need to conquer your gaming and entertainment quests. Viewing Angles 170 Degrees Horizontal and 160 Degrees Vertical.
